name: CALIGGO 13
description:
Hello and welcome to CALIGGO™. If you're reading this then we suspect you have interest in a potential job here at one of our fine facilities? Well you're in luck because CALIGGO™'s thirteenths sector has just opened up for entry level positions!

Requirements for applicants:
-A can-do attitude!
-Can work well alone as well as within a group setting!
-Willing to learn new and exciting skills!

Optional:
-At least 5 years of experience in any managerial role!
-Has key inalienable characteristics!
-Is flexible both figuratively and literally!

CALIGGO™ also offers our revolutionary training program as an option for those who lack experience! Gain experience right on the field free of charge (+free of payment)! The best way for anyone just beginning their career to get the foot in the door!

We look forward to hearing from you, good luck and remember that at CALIGGO: everyone is the future!
